title: The Making of Madonna | B*tch, I’m Madonna | 4
description:
Younger singers like Britney and Christina are taking over the pop charts. But Madonna refuses to be replaced or put out to pasture. She still knows how to stir up controversy to get the spotlight right where she wants it: on her.
